project.name: VPS
project.description: The Gentoo Virtual Private Server project maintains all VPS related packages.

longdescription.p: The Gentoo Virtual Private Server project aims to provide concerted development for all those VPS projects out there like Linux-VServer or OpenVZ (aka Virtuozzo).
We're currently supporting both Linux-VServer and OpenVZ for x86 and amd64. In the nearer future there will be support for ppc and probably alpha/sparc too.

project.goals: Our goal is to ensure that Gentoo provides the best environment possible for developing and running virtual private servers.

body.p: The best way to reach us is on IRC in the #gentoo-vps channel on irc.freenode.net. Please feel free to stop by. We welcome any suggestions for improvement.

The best way to get involved with what we do is to contact one of our developers and hanging around in #gentoo-vps. There are always things to be done (and exciting new ideas to turn into reality), and we're always looking for new ways to make Gentoo the first choice for developers and for system administrators running virtual private servers with Linux-VServer or OpenVZ.
